meanings.definition: A poster or notice for public display.
meanings.sent1: The affiches on the wall advertised the upcoming concert.
meanings.sent2: I saw several affiches on the bulletin board at school.
meanings.sent3: The affiches on the street corner made me laugh with their colorful designs.
meanings.sent4: Her room was filled with affiches, turning it into a mini art gallery.
meanings.sent5: The affiches in the subway station were so eye-catching that I couldn't look away.

meanings.definition: To post or display a poster or notice.
meanings.sent1: She affiches the event details on the community board every week.
meanings.sent2: We need to affiches the new rules in the office for everyone to see.
meanings.sent3: He affiches the lost cat poster on every tree in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The protesters affiches their demands on the government building's doors.
meanings.sent5: The teacher affiches the exam schedule on the classroom door for all students to check.
